original: 南中建寧人，蜀漢、西晉官員。交阯之亂時隨軍出征，後數度抗拒吳軍入侵，互有勝敗。最終敗於吳將虞汜、陶璜，因修允堅持之故，慘被剖腹割心而死。
text: Nanzhong Jianning, Shuhan and Western Jin officials. During the rebellion at the handover, he went out with the army, and later resisted the invasion of Wu army several times, winning each other. In the end, they were defeated by the generals of Wu Yu Pun and Tao Huang. Because of Xiu Yun's insistence, they were cut to death by caesarean section.
